titleStmt.title: The vvise-mans forecast against the evill time By Thomas Barnes. Preacher of the VVord at St Margretts, in New-Fish-streete. London.
titleStmt.author: Barnes, Thomas, Minister of St. Margaret's, New Fish Street, London.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by I. D[awson] for Nathaniell Newbery and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the starre vnder St Peters-Church in Corn-hill, and in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: Also issued as part 3 of STC 1477--STC.
Reproduction of original in the Emmanuel College Library and in the Cambridge University Library, Cambridge, England.

place.placeName: his shop at the signe of the starre vnder St Peters-Church in Corn-hill
